entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 1.0.0.178. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv and dqc_0011.csv successful. - /var/folders/18/_kbcbv855dxf82x5yvny6h0c0000gn/T/tmp7l9u_1kd/packages/resources.zip

[DQC.US.0051.7484] IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit should not be included in the calculation of IncomeLossIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest in the group http://www.nglenergypartners.com/role/ConsolidatingGuarantorAndNonGuarantorFinancialInformationStatementOfOperationsDetails. IncomeLossIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest is before the deduction of tax. Excluding the tax expense from the amount is inconsistent with the meaning of the element because this element represents a before tax item and should not be used to represent an after tax item. If IncomeLossIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest represents the amount after tax then use NetIncomeLoss instead.
Element Checked : IncomeLossIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest
Rule Element Id:7484 Rule version: 9.0.0RC1 -
